attributes.action: Think again about stop penalising the public for banks mistakes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop what will be a burden for the country a mistake that was not caused by anything else but pure greed by the british banking system. Why should we the public have to bail out these greedy banks who still get their bonuses, and have to pay heavier taxes on already struggling families for many decades to come. The gap between rich and poor is not closing it`s getting wider. Wake up Labour your employers (british public) are getting sick and tired of you doing little or nothing to ease the burden.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
